dialogue.introduction: Oka~y, thanks for waiting! The experimental armament cruiser 'Yuubari' has arrived!
dialogue.library_intro: A compact body enriched with heavy arms, the experimental light cruiser, Yuubari. The data that I left behind, those various newly-developed naval heavy weapons were certainly the cause! A shot in the engine room? What are you talking about? Really... how rude you are.
dialogue.secretary1: What is it? Is it your wish to test them out?
dialogue.secretary3: Ah... of course the Admiral agrees? These armaments, I can still take more. Yeah....
dialogue.secretaryidle: Mr. Hiraga's talent is so beautiful.. Huh? Oh Admiral, you were here?!
dialogue.secretarymarried: ♪ Leave it to me, okay? Commander.
dialogue.wedding: I know some people think I'm a bit of an armament geek, but… that's not exactly it. I wanted to collect the best data for you, Admiral… really! That's really the truth…
dialogue.show_players_score: Intel? Admiral, I want to see!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Heading out! W-wait, I'm the slowest here, don't leave me behind!
dialogue.equipment1: Load up more and more~ Yeah, feeling good!
dialogue.equipment2: These arms, let's test them out soon.
dialogue.equipment3: The data was right on the mark!
dialogue.expedition_selection: The data was right on the mark!
dialogue.resource_collection: The data was right on the mark!
dialogue.instant_repair: The data was right on the mark!
dialogue.development: The data was right on the mark!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: This equipment is a bit delicate, please take care.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ah, enough already.... I'm going to have a bit of a long bath.
dialogue.docking_complete: Repairs complete... I took quite some time.
dialogue.ship_construction: Yeah, looks like a new ship has been commissioned.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete, the fleet has returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Light Cruiser Yuubari, launching! wai-...c'mon, wait for me~!
dialogue.battle_start: Hmm, is it okay to try all of these out, I wonder?
dialogue.night_battle: It's... the other side of the night!
dialogue.night_attack: Heheh, tell me your opinion later!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Heheh, tell me your opinion later!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Heheh, tell me your opinion later!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Heheh, tell me your opinion later!
dialogue.mvp: These newly developed naval weapons, I have to check them without fail! Eh? I'm slow? It.. It can't be helped, the equipment is heavy!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: I didn't even get to try them out~!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Nuu... Seems I stacked them up a bit too much, huh...
dialogue.sunk: I got some... good... data, yeah?.... Samidare-chan, is it okay... to have just this result... yeah?
dialogue.white_day_2015: Ah, Admiral, is this for me? Thanks! Should I eat this all once when I unwrap it?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Congratulation, today is a important day for us. Tell us your thought after this, Admiral!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Ha... It's becoming a little warm, don't you think? Looks like this year's summer is already here. That was fast.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Hah, summer's hot, isn't it. Admiral, since it's like this, I think I'd like to wear some summer-ish equipment.
dialogue.fall_2015: It's the autumn of food, isn't it, admiral. A season with so many delicious foods. I don't even know what to pick. *drool*
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Admiral! Admiral, here, it's a present from me. Huh? You have one for me as well?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Stay with me this year too, okay♪? Aah, don't leave me behind, okay?

hourly.0000: 0 midnight. Ah! I have to check the recording.
hourly.0100: 1 o'clock huh... Ah, for me, I'm not really looking forward to watching the late-night anime.
hourly.0200: It's already 2 o'clock, huh. Admiral, please take a break.
hourly.0300: It's 3 o'clock. Admiral, you sleeping? Gonna sleep?
hourly.0400: 4 o'clock. Admiral, please stop talking. I'm trying to sleep here.
hourly.0500: So bright.... 5 o'clock... It's already morning...
hourly.0600: It's 6 o'clock. Admiral, please freshen up.
hourly.0700: It's 7 in the morning. Admiral, no going back to sleep!
hourly.0800: It's 8 o'clock. Alrighty, let's get this morning's data!
hourly.0900: It's now 9 o'clock! Let's make it a great day, okay?
hourly.1000: It's 10 o'clock. How's it going? Doing alright?
hourly.1100: It's 11 o'clock. How about something like soba for lunch?
hourly.1200: It's now 12 o'clock. I want to eat something nice for lunch today~. Maybe Tempura soba?
hourly.1300: 1 o'clock P.M. I aways get sleepy after a meal~ It's just natural providence.
hourly.1400: 2 o'clock P.M. Let's do our best this afternoon too!
hourly.1500: 3 o'clock P.M., I've got a craving for sweets just now...
hourly.1600: It's now 4 o'clock P.M. I'm getting interested in the Admiral's current results!
hourly.1700: The night is closing in... It's 5 P.M.
hourly.1800: It's 6 P.M. The rice prep hasn't been done. Is Mamiya close by, I wonder?
hourly.1900: It's 7 P.M. Hey, Admiral, let's have dinner. Ginpai-ing is forbidden!
hourly.2000: It's 8 P.M. Well? It is tasty?
hourly.2100: It's 9 P.M. I've aquired a~ll the data on the Admiral's favourite menu!
hourly.2200: It's 10 P.M. Ah, man, that 5500-ton level is truly noisy. Should we have some words?
hourly.2300: It's 11 P.M. You're still going strong, huh? In that case, I shall accompany you.
